title: Update Go embed directive for new static assets
description:
Update internal/tickboard/server/server.go:
1. Ensure //go:embed directive includes new build output
2. Update file serving to handle hashed asset paths
3. Verify index.html is served at root
4. Test that assets load correctly when running tk board

Test: go build ./cmd/tk && ./tk board (verify board loads with new UI)
acceptance_criteria: tk board serves new Lit-based UI, assets load without 404s, Go build succeeds
